name: MarineFinancing
label: marine finance
definition: A loan for the purchase of a boat or other vessel.

name: percentageAdvanced
definition: The percentage of the purchase price advanced as the loan.
label: percentage advanced

name: boatHeldAsChattel
definition: Whether the vessel is to be held in ownership as a form of chattel by the lender during the period of the loan.
label: boat held as chattel

name: residential
definition: Whether the boat is intended to be used and is legally able to be used as a place of residence.
label: residential

name: mooredAt
label: moored at
definition: Textual description (name etc.) of where the vessel is to be moored if it has a permanent mooring place.
